566480.name: Fantasy Grounds - Deadlands Reloaded: Abracadabra and an Arab Cadaver (Savage Worlds)
566480.description:
Deadlands Reloaded: Abracadabra and an Arab Cadaver

Adventure
Gather 'round, pardners, for a li'l tale of one man's quest to reshape the Weird
West, another man's mission to resurrect evil in a foreign land, and how the posse
gets caught in between. Oh, you're one of the posse? Whatcha doin' here then? You
shouldn't be peekin' at this!
Anyway, this is an adventure full of intrigue and weird magic, barnstormin' and
minglin', usual and unusual characters. The locales are made generic for ya, Marshal,
so you can drop them into your campaign, and the premise is flexible enough to build
a long saga on. So hold on to your boots and away we go!
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software, the Savage Worlds v3
Ruleset, Deadlands Reloaded Player's Guide module and the Deadlands Reloaded Marshalls
module.
Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Ben Turner
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Aki Heikkinen
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
